title: 4 weeks to review changes for paying users

tosdr.case: user is notified a month or more in advance
tosdr.tldr: RapidShare informs you about changes before they apply. Paying users will get four weeks to review any disadvantageous changes. “RapidShare shall be obligated to refer the user to this rule again when providing notification of the new Terms of Use.”
